Sentencas: Materials for a solid oxide fuel cell were investigated aiming especially at low temperature operation of the cell.
Titulo: Ceramic materials containing rare earth oxides for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Although yttria-stabilized zirconia has been most popularly investigated as an electrolyte fur the cell, the conductivity reaches the allowable level only around or higher than 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Ceramic materials containing rare earth oxides for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The use of a ceria-based electrolyte, especially samaria doped ceria, significantly lowered the operation temperature of the cell due to its high oxide ion conductivity.
Titulo: Ceramic materials containing rare earth oxides for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The reduction of ceria with H-2 and resultant electronic conduction could be avoided by the coating of YSZ on to the anode side of the ceria.
Titulo: Ceramic materials containing rare earth oxides for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The ceria layer facing the air electrode is effective in reducing cathodic polarization, Ni-ceria cermet exhibited higher fuel electrode performance than Ni-YSZ cernet in lowering polarization.
Titulo: Ceramic materials containing rare earth oxides for solid oxide fuel cell
